amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to reduce the appropriated amount for the Office of the Director, National Institutes of Health to the FY19 appropriated amount.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the appropriated amount for the Office of the Director, National Institutes of Health to FY19.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mills amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 247 (Roll no. 652).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mills amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 247 (Roll no. 652).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
